weaknesses: accessibility: Text contrast fails WCAG AA standards - gray text on dark background appears to be ~2.5:1 ratio
accessibility: Touch targets too small - Settings and Upload buttons appear under 44x44px minimum
typography: Inconsistent text sizes for performance context - lyrics should be much larger for 3-10ft viewing distance
visual hierarchy: Chord symbols blend with lyrics - insufficient differentiation between chord names and lyrics
spacing: Cramped vertical spacing between lyric lines for teleprompter use
